sub_title: Chief Commercial Officer at Jumbo Group | THNKer
summary:
Growing up in Venezuela as part of a large and close family, I was always surrounded with activity, optimism, laughter and passion. Values I take with me in everything I do. I thrive in fast paced environments where diversity of thought and background make ideas flourish. Living in 7 vibrant cities worldwide made me appreciate the challenges and excitement of working with multicultural teams.

DEVELOPMENT
Always keen to learn and grow, I did a MBA in Boston and continue to participate in professional development programs. My curiosity motivated me to move abroad and take different marketing and management roles with local, regional and global scope in organizations like Mattel, Mead Johnson Nutrition and Nickelodeon. 

LEADERSHIP
I am a participative team leader, easily identify a course of action and facilitate teams to find their own way to approach challenges. Having been in many business situations I know how to pivot to get the right result. I am demanding but fair, I am a coach and mentor. I am curious, passionate and a little goofy. I promote environments where people feel heard and comfortable to speak up resulting in commitment to work harder to reach common goals. I strive to be a role model.

BACKGROUND
I embraced opportunities in my career to develop cross media marketing plans; research consumer journeys; accelerate digital transformation and lead cross functional team on apps development.
Although my experience was gained at large corporations, I worked internationally where resources are limited. I quickly learned to be willing and able to wear many hats and roll up my sleeves. I adapt easily. I get things done!

FUTURE
My passion for business results derives from strong team collaboration. I am a self starter, looking to share my wisdom :) and experience. Happy to share thoughts and act as a soundboard.

________________________________________________________________________________________________________
I decided for 2016 to be a year to refocus. Travel, move countries, take several courses to broaden my knowledge and decide what direction to take my career next. Before long I found myself, once more, getting approached by people asking for support thus becoming a  freelance consultant. 

One of my passions is to share my knowledge, experience and insights with young professionals and help them realize their potential. I am really enjoying consulting on business strategies and coaching, yet like to have a more holistic and sustainable impact on organizations. 

Clients include The Blue Suit; https://www.thebluesuit.com/ Zest for life and Raw Food Cafe; http://zestforlife.nl/en/zest-for-life/", 'title': 'Principal', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 8964, 'name': 'MGA Entertainment', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQGOr3OTLmrHiQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1575741644134?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=VqBDAAz-8ah_z_xk8uP4s_eFV3kAYr-ICpLPUEbYCL0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/mga-entertainment/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'MGA Entertainment', 'description': 'Responsible for portfolio management, marketing strategy, and European team leadership. After 6 months though, I was promoted to General Manager Nickelodeon Northern Europe. 

Suddenly I found myself not only responsible for the commercial area, but also for the programming, production, creative and marketing for linear TV Channels (20 feeds); digital platforms (verticals, apps, social media); and Consumer Products in 11 countries with a revenue of $115M. To say I hit the ground running is an understatement.

With a team of over 70 people, I was able to move Nickelodeon to the next level turning back declining ratings in Germany. Guiding a multidisciplinary team, we worked towards the launch of Nickelodeon into a 24-hour channel in GSA. The Nicknight brand targeting millennials was born,  rapidly gained loyal fans due to relevant content, interactive multiscreen events, social media engagement and original language programming.  We successfully relaunched Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles with new content and a comprehensive consumer products program.

With my interest in digital, I loved leading the team that created and launched a VOD app (IOS and Android) for Nick Jr called “Watch and Learn”. This project turned out to be a successful joint venture and led to me consulting for them to draft a strategic plan and advise them on marketing communications.', 'title': 'Strategic Marketing, Branding and Communications', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 361792, 'name': 'Mead Johnson Nutrition', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQH-SdXETqOI2g/company-logo_400_400/0/1519883840857?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=Z-SityBFehLaOQ18oqOpZSLRXi-bA5nmERXofRImulM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/mead-johnson-nutrition/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'Mead Johnson Nutrition', 'description': 'Moving into a different industry allowed me to broaden the scope of my expertise and gave me the possibility to grow while still working within the kids and families target group. Being new to the “food” industry I quickly immersed myself into the business to understand production processes, quality controls, key opinion leaders, tight regulations and consumer journeys. In order to reach out to parents more efficiently across Europe, and establish direct communication, I initiated a digital transformation project working on an European platform and content strategy together with LBI Lost Boys. 

I created and led the European rollout for Enfamil’s first consumer campaign messaging the benefit of DHA (Omega 3 fatty acid) on infant formulas. By launching this initiative we were able to grow brand awareness 10% across Poland and broaden distribution to mass retailers in Italy, Spain and France.', 'title': 'Regional Marketing Director Europe', 'employment_type': None}]}]
